name: RYAN_WHITE_DX
description: This table contains diagnosis information from Ryan White abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_DX_ID
columns.description: A diagnosis record documented on the patient for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_DX_DATE
columns.description: Start date of a diagnosis documented on the patient for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_DX_RESOLVED_DATE
columns.description: End date of a diagnosis documented on the patient for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_DX_ASSESSMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Assessment detail for a diagnosis documented on the patient for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_DX_COMMENT
columns.description: Additional comment for a diagnosis documented on the patient for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_DX_PROBLEM
columns.description: Medical issue resulting in diagnosis documented on the patient for Ryan White reporting.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_DX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Status category for a diagnosis documented on the patient for Ryan White reporting.
